info.title: OpenDota API
info.description:
# Introduction
This API provides Dota 2 related data.
Please keep request rate to approximately 3/s.

rank_tier.description: The rank tier of the player. Tens place indicates rank, ones place indicates stars.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of matches to limit to

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Number of matches to offset start by

parameters.name: excluded_account_id
parameters.description: Account IDs not in the match (array)

parameters.name: with_hero_id
parameters.description: Hero IDs on the player's team (array)

parameters.name: against_hero_id
parameters.description: Hero IDs against the player's team (array)

parameters.name: significant
parameters.description: Whether the match was significant for aggregation purposes

parameters.name: having
parameters.description: The minimum number of games played, for filtering hero stats

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The field to return matches sorted by in descending order

get.description: Distributions of MMR data by bracket and country
Search players by personaname. Default similarity is 0.51

Get hero performance over a range of match durations

get.description: Get players who have played this hero
